Fettah Kiran

Researcher
University of Houston

Bio

I am a Ph.D. student working under the guidance of Dr. Ioannis Pavlidis in Affective & Data Computing ACDC lab. I have an M.Sc. in Computer Science from Louisiana State University. I’m working in the NSF funded Affective Math project involving by conducting experiment, analysing data, and developing models.

Research Interests

  • Affective Computing
  • Machine Learning
  • Computer Vision
